verses.verse: וַיְהִ֤י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi had occurred רָעָב֙ <S%H7458><s%> ra-'Av And there was a famine בָּאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ba-'A-retz, in the land מִלְּבַד֙ <S%H905><s%> mil-le-Vad beside הָרָעָ֣ב <S%H7458><s%> ha-ra-'Av famine הָרִאשׁ֔וֹן <S%H7223><s%> ha-ri-Shon, the first אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher that הָיָ֖ה <S%H1961><s%> ha-Yah had occurred בִּימֵ֣י <S%H3117><s%> bi-Mei that was in the days אַבְרָהָ֑ם <S%H85><s%> 'av-ra-Ham; of Abraham וַיֵּ֧לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> vai-Ye-lech went יִצְחָ֛ק <S%H3327><s%> yitz-Chak And Isaac אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to אֲבִימֶּ֥לֶךְ <S%H40><s%> 'a-vim-Me-lech unto Abimelech מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech- king פְּלִשְׁתִּ֖ים <S%H6430><s%> pe-lish-Tim of the Philistines גְּרָֽרָה׃ <S%H1642><s%> ge-Ra-rah. unto Gerar

וַיֵּרָ֤א <S%H7200><s%> vai-ye-Ra appeared אֵלָיו֙ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lav about יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, And the LORD וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer unto him and said אַל־ <S%H408><s%> 'al- not תֵּרֵ֣ד <S%H3381><s%> te-Red Go not down מִצְרָ֑יְמָה <S%H4714><s%> mitz-Ra-ye-mah; into Egypt שְׁכֹ֣ן <S%H7931><s%> she-Chon dwell בָּאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ba-'A-retz, in the land אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher of which אֹמַ֥ר <S%H559><s%> 'o-Mar which I shall tell אֵלֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lei-cha. about

גּ֚וּר <S%H1481><s%> gur Sojourn בָּאָ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ba-'A-retz in this land הַזֹּ֔את <S%H2063><s%> haz-Zot, likewise וְאֶֽהְיֶ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> ve-'eh-Yeh become עִמְּךָ֖ <S%H5973><s%> 'im-me-Cha you וַאֲבָרְכֶ֑ךָּ <S%H1288><s%> va-'a-va-re-Che-ka; and I will be with thee and will bless כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for לְךָ֣ le-Cha וּֽלְזַרְעֲךָ֗ <S%H2233><s%> u-le-zar-'a-Cha, thee for unto thee and unto thy seed אֶתֵּן֙ <S%H5414><s%> 'et-Ten I will give אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all הָֽאֲרָצֹ֣ת <S%H776><s%> ha-'a-ra-Tzot countries הָאֵ֔ל <S%H411><s%> ha-'El, all these וַהֲקִֽמֹתִי֙ <S%H6965><s%> va-ha-ki-mo-Ti and I will perform אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַשְּׁבֻעָ֔ה <S%H7621><s%> hash-she-vu-'Ah, the oath אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which נִשְׁבַּ֖עְתִּי <S%H7650><s%> nish-Ba'-ti which I sware לְאַבְרָהָ֥ם <S%H85><s%> le-'av-ra-Ham unto Abraham אָבִֽיךָ׃ <S%H1><s%> 'a-Vi-cha. thy father

וְהִרְבֵּיתִ֤י <S%H7235><s%> ve-hir-bei-Ti to multiply אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- זַרְעֲךָ֙ <S%H2233><s%> zar-'a-Cha thy seed כְּכוֹכְבֵ֣י <S%H3556><s%> ke-choch-Vei as the stars הַשָּׁמַ֔יִם <S%H8064><s%> hash-sha-Ma-yim, of heaven וְנָתַתִּ֣י <S%H5414><s%> ve-na-tat-Ti and will give לְזַרְעֲךָ֔ <S%H2233><s%> le-zar-'a-Cha, unto thy seed אֵ֥ת <S%H853><s%> 'et כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all הָאֲרָצֹ֖ת <S%H776><s%> ha-'a-ra-Tzot countries הָאֵ֑ל <S%H411><s%> ha-'El; all these וְהִתְבָּרֲכ֣וּ <S%H1288><s%> ve-hit-ba-ra-Chu be blessed בְזַרְעֲךָ֔ <S%H2233><s%> ve-zar-'a-Cha, and in thy seed כֹּ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> kol all גּוֹיֵ֥י <S%H1471><s%> go-Yei shall all the nations הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz. of the earth

עֵ֕קֶב <S%H6118><s%> 'E-kev Because אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- after שָׁמַ֥ע <S%H8085><s%> sha-Ma' obeyed אַבְרָהָ֖ם <S%H85><s%> 'av-ra-Ham that Abraham בְּקֹלִ֑י <S%H6963><s%> be-ko-Li; my voice וַיִּשְׁמֹר֙ <S%H8104><s%> vai-yish-Mor and kept מִשְׁמַרְתִּ֔י <S%H4931><s%> mish-mar-Ti, my charge מִצְוֹתַ֖י <S%H4687><s%> mitz-vo-Tai my commandments חֻקּוֹתַ֥י <S%H2708><s%> chuk-ko-Tai my statutes וְתוֹרֹתָֽי׃ <S%H8451><s%> ve-to-ro-Tai. and my laws
וַיֵּ֥שֶׁב <S%H3427><s%> vai-Ye-shev dwelt יִצְחָ֖ק <S%H3327><s%> yitz-Chak And Isaac בִּגְרָֽר׃ <S%H1642><s%> big-Rar. in Gerar

וַֽיִּשְׁאֲל֞וּ <S%H7592><s%> vai-yish-'a-Lu asked אַנְשֵׁ֤י <S%H376><s%> 'an-Shei the men הַמָּקוֹם֙ <S%H4725><s%> ham-ma-kOm of the place לְאִשְׁתּ֔וֹ <S%H802><s%> le-'ish-To, [him] of his wife וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer and he said אֲחֹ֣תִי <S%H269><s%> 'a-Cho-ti She [is] my sister הִ֑וא <S%H1931><s%> hi he כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> ki for יָרֵא֙ <S%H3372><s%> ya-Re for he feared לֵאמֹ֣ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor to say אִשְׁתִּ֔י <S%H802><s%> 'ish-Ti, [She is] my wife פֶּן־ <S%H6435><s%> pen- might יַֽהַרְגֻ֜נִי <S%H2026><s%> ya-har-Gu-ni should kill אַנְשֵׁ֤י <S%H376><s%> 'an-Shei the men הַמָּקוֹם֙ <S%H4725><s%> ham-ma-kOm of the place עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- account רִבְקָ֔ה <S%H7259><s%> riv-Kah, me for Rebekah כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for טוֹבַ֥ת <S%H2896><s%> to-Vat because she [was] fair מַרְאֶ֖ה <S%H4758><s%> mar-'Eh to look upon הִֽיא׃ <S%H1931><s%> Hi. It

וַיְהִ֗י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi, came כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki when אָֽרְכוּ־ <S%H748><s%> 'a-re-chu- And it came to pass when he had been there a long ל֥וֹ lo שָׁם֙ <S%H8033><s%> sham had been there הַיָּמִ֔ים <S%H3117><s%> hai-ya-Mim, time וַיַּשְׁקֵ֗ף <S%H8259><s%> vai-yash-Kef, looked out אֲבִימֶ֙לֶךְ֙ <S%H40><s%> 'a-vi-Me-lech that Abimelech מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech king פְּלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <S%H6430><s%> pe-lish-Tim, of the Philistines בְּעַ֖ד <S%H1157><s%> be-'Ad at הַֽחַלּ֑וֹן <S%H2474><s%> ha-chal-Lon; a window וַיַּ֗רְא <S%H7200><s%> vai-Yar, and saw וְהִנֵּ֤ה <S%H2009><s%> ve-hin-Neh and behold יִצְחָק֙ <S%H3327><s%> yitz-Chak and behold Isaac מְצַחֵ֔ק <S%H6711><s%> me-tza-Chek, [was] sporting אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> 'et רִבְקָ֥ה <S%H7259><s%> riv-Kah with Rebekah אִשְׁתּֽוֹ׃ <S%H802><s%> ish-To. his wife

וַיִּקְרָ֨א <S%H7121><s%> vai-yik-Ra called אֲבִימֶ֜לֶךְ <S%H40><s%> 'a-vi-Me-lech And Abimelech לְיִצְחָ֗ק <S%H3327><s%> le-yitz-Chak, Isaac וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer and said אַ֣ךְ <S%H389><s%> 'ach Behold of a surety הִנֵּ֤ה <S%H2009><s%> hin-Neh Behold אִשְׁתְּךָ֙ <S%H802><s%> 'ish-te-Cha she [is] thy wife הִ֔וא <S%H1931><s%> hi he וְאֵ֥יךְ <S%H349><s%> ve-'Eich How אָמַ֖רְתָּ <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar-ta and how saidst אֲחֹ֣תִי <S%H269><s%> 'a-Cho-ti other הִ֑וא <S%H1931><s%> hi he וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said אֵלָיו֙ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lav about יִצְחָ֔ק <S%H3327><s%> yitz-Chak, Isaac כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki Because אָמַ֔רְתִּי <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar-ti, unto him Because I said פֶּן־ <S%H6435><s%> pen- might אָמ֖וּת <S%H4191><s%> 'a-Mut Lest I die עָלֶֽיהָ׃ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lei-ha. account

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said אֲבִימֶ֔לֶךְ <S%H40><s%> 'a-vi-Me-lech, And Abimelech מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> mah- What זֹּ֖את <S%H2063><s%> zot you עָשִׂ֣יתָ <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Si-ta What [is] this thou hast done לָּ֑נוּ La-nu; כִּ֠מְעַט <S%H4592><s%> Kim-'at might lightly שָׁכַ֞ב <S%H7901><s%> sha-Chav have lien אַחַ֤ד <S%H259><s%> 'a-Chad unto us;one הָעָם֙ <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am of the people אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> 'et- with אִשְׁתֶּ֔ךָ <S%H802><s%> 'ish-Te-cha, with thy wife וְהֵבֵאתָ֥ <S%H935><s%> ve-he-ve-Ta and thou shouldest have brought עָלֵ֖ינוּ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lei-nu and אָשָֽׁם׃ <S%H817><s%> 'a-Sham. guiltiness

וַיְצַ֣ו <S%H6680><s%> vay-Tzav charged אֲבִימֶ֔לֶךְ <S%H40><s%> 'a-vi-Me-lech, And Abimelech אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all הָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am all [his] people לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor; saying הַנֹּגֵ֜עַ <S%H5060><s%> han-no-Ge-a' He that toucheth בָּאִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> ba-'Ish this man הַזֶּ֛ה <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh this וּבְאִשְׁתּ֖וֹ <S%H802><s%> u-ve-'ish-To or his wife מ֥וֹת <S%H4191><s%> Mot shall surely יוּמָֽת׃ <S%H4191><s%> yu-Mat. be put to death

וַיִּזְרַ֤ע <S%H2232><s%> vai-yiz-Ra' sowed יִצְחָק֙ <S%H3327><s%> yitz-Chak Then Isaac בָּאָ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ba-'A-retz in that land הַהִ֔וא <S%H1931><s%> ha-Hiv, the same וַיִּמְצָ֛א <S%H4672><s%> vai-yim-Tza and received בַּשָּׁנָ֥ה <S%H8141><s%> bash-sha-Nah in the same year הַהִ֖וא <S%H1931><s%> ha-Hiv the same מֵאָ֣ה <S%H3967><s%> me-'Ah hundred שְׁעָרִ֑ים <S%H8180><s%> she-'a-Rim; hundredfold וַֽיְבָרֲכֵ֖הוּ <S%H1288><s%> vay-va-ra-Che-hu blessed יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. and the LORD

וַיִּגְדַּ֖ל <S%H1431><s%> vai-yig-Dal waxed great הָאִ֑ישׁ <S%H376><s%> ha-'Ish; And the man וַיֵּ֤לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> vai-Ye-lech forward הָלוֹךְ֙ <S%H1980><s%> ha-loCh and continued וְגָדֵ֔ל <S%H1431><s%> ve-ga-Del, great עַ֥ד <S%H5704><s%> 'ad until כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for גָדַ֖ל <S%H1431><s%> ga-Dal became מְאֹֽד׃ <S%H3966><s%> me-'Od. very

וַֽיְהִי־ <S%H1961><s%> vay-hi- had ל֤וֹ lo מִקְנֵה־ <S%H4735><s%> mik-neh- For he had possession צֹאן֙ <S%H6629><s%> tzoN of flocks וּמִקְנֵ֣ה <S%H4735><s%> u-mik-Neh and possession בָקָ֔ר <S%H1241><s%> va-Kar, of herds וַעֲבֻדָּ֖ה <S%H5657><s%> va-'a-vud-Dah of servants רַבָּ֑ה <S%H7227><s%> rab-Bah; and great store וַיְקַנְא֥וּ <S%H7065><s%> vay-kan-'U envied אֹת֖וֹ <S%H853><s%> o-To פְּלִשְׁתִּֽים׃ <S%H6430><s%> pe-lish-Tim. and the Philistines

וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> ve-chol now all הַבְּאֵרֹ֗ת <S%H875><s%> hab-be-'e-Rot, For all the wells אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which חָֽפְרוּ֙ <S%H2658><s%> cha-fe-Ru had digged עַבְדֵ֣י <S%H5650><s%> 'av-Dei servants אָבִ֔יו <S%H1><s%> 'a-Viv, which his father's בִּימֵ֖י <S%H3117><s%> bi-Mei in the days אַבְרָהָ֣ם <S%H85><s%> 'av-ra-Ham of Abraham אָבִ֑יו <S%H1><s%> 'a-Viv; his father סִתְּמ֣וּם <S%H5640><s%> sit-te-Mum had stopped פְּלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <S%H6430><s%> pe-lish-Tim, the Philistines וַיְמַלְא֖וּם <S%H4390><s%> vay-mal-'Um them and filled עָפָֽר׃ <S%H6083><s%> 'a-Far. them with earth
